extendedInfo.description: âââââ "We would personally recommend everyone to try this game, especially those who love brain teasers. Youâll love it!" â Gameographics âââââThis game is completely free and full, and contains no advertisement.EPISODE II IS LIVE on the following link: http://bit.ly/PqepngWARNING! Some reviews may contain spoiler. Think twice before reading them.NB: PLEASE do not tell who is the killer in reviews! You can break other people fun with it! Thanks in advance!Description: This original game is based on classical english detective rules. Every day someone dies and you need to figure out who is the killer. Everybody has a common mystery story of the past. Everybody could have a motive to do this. And you have only seven days to stop the murderer. It is not a generic adventure game â there is no happy end in this scenario, you can either win or lose the game (if everybody dies). Speak with characters, investigate crime scenes, guess who lies, look at your dreams to find clues and try to arrest the killer before itâs too late. â A new murder every day â Several original mini-games â Old mystery background story â Original gameplay for those who like to think. Game page on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WhoIsTheKiller Visit it to find how to gain additional Energy in game every day!

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Smooth game. No stress. Nice images. Good storyline. No problem with Sony experia. Doesn\'t need to spend much time to finnish it.
reviews.author: rexalleo danielle

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: I love this game it was very fun, I liked how they had an interesting twist at the end
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fatal error!
reviews.comment: Good game, good graphics, But \"fatal error\"!! >___<  Please fix!
reviews.author: Nichole Fian

reviews.title: Brilliant game . great twist.
reviews.comment: Play the game  Amazing story and amazing twist.  5 well deserved stars
reviews.author: Marcelo Ferreira

reviews.title: Pretty good game but I really had to strain my eyes to see the text.
reviews.comment: Aside from the very small font of the text and that it forced you to talk to everyone before making an arrest, and you cant exit the game, it was good.
reviews.author: Rosemary Catt

reviews.title: Has Potential But...
reviews.comment: It always has a fatal error occur on my Samsung Galaxy Note (AT&T) during dream portion of first day...EPIC FAIL! Needs to be fixed!!!!
reviews.author: Mesha Leysner

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I wanted to arrest someone based on info given after the 3rd day. I couldn\'t arrest until I spoke to everyone about that person or something along those lines. Then I couldn\'t even talk about certain people because they don\'t trust. Finally on the last two people, I still couldn\'t make a arrest and ended up being killed. What a waste of time.
reviews.author: Michael Ivie

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: I thoroughly enjoyed the game. I had to play it twice though, I ran out of coffee before I can make people talk to me. Otherwise it\'s entertaining and the visuals are great. Kudos!
reviews.author: Lara Lorenzo

reviews.title: Not fun
reviews.comment: I can\'arrest anyone. Not in this nor in other episodes i\'ve installed. Sorry for the time spent trying... :-(  wouldn\'t recommend this game.
reviews.author: Ivana Kupresak

reviews.title: A user.
reviews.comment: Very nice game! I liked the plot as well as the artwork and the music. It doesn\'t require money to play but it is optional.  Even a mainstream player though can go through it without any extra help that would cost.  Congratulations to the developers team!
reviews.author: Rayne Amadre

reviews.title: one of a kind
reviews.comment: i was able to find out the killer on my second try. had to reset the game after i found out that i was doing it wrong. it force closes sometimes but was able to save my progress. i love it
reviews.author: Larisa Alvero

reviews.title: Great but
reviews.comment: I wish we could play the game many times with different outcomes... And what about the coffee cups, we begin with only two and it\'s almost impossible to get more then 5!
reviews.author: Zandra Cristina Ellery

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: To all the mystery lovers, I would suggest, Nancy Drew novels. The mysteries in those novels are much more interesting than Sherlock Holmes\' And yeah, nice game!
reviews.author: aamirtalal khan

reviews.title: Who is the killer(Episode I)
reviews.comment: Was a little confusing at first. It was good.
reviews.author: Mike Maynard

reviews.title: Pretty decent
reviews.comment: It was a pretty decent game. The scrambled words get hard but it wasn\'t too bad. Better than just the old find whatnot in the picture
reviews.author: Sharif Smith

reviews.title: Good but needs work
reviews.comment: The worst problem is you should be able to arrest someone without all the interviews, arrest them at the end of each day! Please make this available and I will consider purchasing episodes 3 and further, larger text would also be nice.
reviews.author: Dan Molloy

reviews.title: Awesome, best game I ever played
reviews.comment: Its so interesting and good for brain .it comes with challenge and feel good when it is solved
reviews.author: Pooja Verma

reviews.title: Boring
reviews.comment: That was a boring 10 minutes, i knew who the murderer was but must talk to everyone about everything before arrest and then everyone were dead anyway.. and its impossible to exit the game. Good graphics but that was everything that was exiting about this one..
reviews.author: Karolina Lie

reviews.title: Best game ever \342\231\245\342\231\241\342\231\245
reviews.comment: I love every single things in this game.. However, the font was little hard to see as well as there are some errors in the word\'s games.. Overall, this is the best free game ever.. I cant wait until the next episode is downloaded..
reviews.author: Nancy Nguy\341\273\205n

reviews.title: Cant arrest
reviews.comment: It says cant arrest the suspect until you finish interviewing all the ppl but after i interview all the ppl, the game over.
reviews.author: Siti Z
